resources.description:
This data has been taken from LGInform http://lginform.local.gov.uk/ the data set ref ID 206. It shows the total expenditure for Highways and transport services (RSX) in Plymouth. This data has been taken from LGInform at http://lginform.local.gov.uk/ Data set reference ID:206 The data shows the total expenditure - Highways and transport services (RSX) in Plymouth. 

This is total revenue expenditure and includes employee costs and running expenses. It is taken from the Revenue Outturn Service Expenditure Summary (RSX). 

The data are revenue outturn estimates of local authority revenue expenditure. 

These estimates are on a non-Financial Reporting Standard 17 (FRS17) and PFI “Off Balance Sheet”. 

Source name: Communities and Local Government Collection name: Revenue Outturn (RSX)

Polarity: No polarity

Polarity is how sentiment is measured "Sentiment is usually considered to have "poles" positive and negative these are often translated into "good" and "bad" sentiment analysis is considered useful to tell us what is good and bad in our information stream

  
This is the total revenue expenditure and includes employee costs and running expenses. It is taken from the Revenue Outturn Service Expenditure Summary (RSX). The data are revenue outturn estimates of local authority revenue expenditure. 

These estimates are on a non-Financial Reporting Standard 17 (FRS17) and PFI “Off Balance Sheet”. 
Source name: Communities and Local Government
Collection name: Revenue Outturn (RSX)
Polarity: No polarity
